name.vi: Hộp tăng nguyên tố tấn công

description.en: This box contains one Attack Stone per natural element, increasing Element Attack by 20% for 1 hour. Each Stone's element must match the Weapon's element.
description.ar: This box contains one Attack Stone per natural element, increasing Element Attack by 20% for 1 hour. Each Stone's element must match the Weapon's element.
description.br: Esta caixa contém uma Pedra de Ataque por elemento natural, aumentando o Ataque Elemental em 20% por 1 hora. O elemento de cada Pedra deve corresponder ao elemento da Arma.
description.cns: 这个箱子包含每个自然元素一块攻击石头，1小时内增加20%元素属性攻击。每块石头的元素必须与武器的元素相匹配。
description.de: Diese Box enthält einen Angriffsstein pro natürlichem Element, der Elementattacken für eine Stunde um 20% verstärkt. Das Element des Steines muss dem Element der Waffe entsprechen.
description.fi: This box contains one Attack Stone per natural element, increasing Element Attack by 20% for 1 hour. Each Stone's element must match the Weapon's element.
description.fil: This box contains one Attack Stone per natural element, increasing Element Attack by 20% for 1 hour. Each Stone's element must match the Weapon's element.
description.fr: Cette boîte contient une Pierre d'Attaque Élémentaire pour chaque élément, ajoutant à votre arme 20% de dégâts élémentaires pendant 1 heure. Chaque pierre ne peut être utilisée qu'avec une arme du même élément.
description.id: Kotak ini berisi satu Attack Stone per elemen alam, meningkatkan Element Attack sebesar 20% selama 1 jam. Setiap elemen Stone harus sesuai dengan elemen Senjata.
description.it: This box contains one Attack Stone per natural element, increasing Element Attack by 20% for 1 hour. Each Stone's element must match the Weapon's element.
description.jp: このボックスの中には1つだけ属性の攻撃力がアップするストーンが入っています。そのストーンを使用すると1時間、属性攻撃力が20%増加します。各属性ストーンと、使用する武器の属性が一致していなければいけません。
description.kr: 이 박스는 속성당 하나의 공격스톤을 포함하고, 속성 공격력을 1시간동안 20% 증가시킵니다. 각 스톤의 속성은 무기의 속성과 일치해야 합니다.
description.nl: This box contains one Attack Stone per natural element, increasing Element Attack by 20% for 1 hour. Each Stone's element must match the Weapon's element.
description.pl: This box contains one Attack Stone per natural element, increasing Element Attack by 20% for 1 hour. Each Stone's element must match the Weapon's element.
description.ru: This box contains one Attack Stone per natural element, increasing Element Attack by 20% for 1 hour. Each Stone's element must match the Weapon's element.
description.sp: Esta caja contiene una Piedra de Ataque de cada elemento natural, lo que aumenta el Ataque Elemental en un 20% durante 1 hora. El elemento de cada Piedra debe coincidir con el elemento del Arma.
description.sw: This box contains one Attack Stone per natural element, increasing Element Attack by 20% for 1 hour. Each Stone's element must match the Weapon's element.
description.th: กล่องนี้บรรจุหินโจมตี 1 ก้อนต่อธาตุธรรมชาติ เพิ่มพลังโจมตีธาตุ 20% เป็นเวลา 1 ชั่วโมง ธาตุของหินแต่ละชิ้นต้องตรงกับธาตุของอาวุธ
description.tw: 這個箱子每個自然屬性包含一個攻擊石，在 1 小時內增加 20% 的攻擊屬性，每塊石頭的屬性必須與武器的屬性相匹配。
description.vi: Hộp này chứa một Đá Tấn công cho mỗi nguyên tố tự nhiên, tăng Nguyên tố tấn công lên 20% trong 1 giờ. Mỗi nguyên tố của Đá phải phù hợp với nguyên tố của Vũ khí.
